title: Task 1: Describe visual or contextual characteristic of a work of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately use any examples of specific VISUAL evidence to describe the materials or techniques used to create the Bayeux Tapestry.
Response accurately uses ONE example of specific VISUAL evidence to describe the materials or techniques used to create the Bayeux Tapestry.

title: Task 2: Describes a contextual element of a work of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately use any examples of specific CONTEXTUAL evidence to describe a historical event depicted in the Bayeux Tapestry.
Response accurately uses ONE example of specific CONTEXTUAL evidence to describe a historical event depicted in the Bayeux Tapestry.

title: Task 3: Explains how context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content and/or function.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately use specific evidence to explain one example of how a political point of view is shown through the depiction of the events.
Accurately uses specific evidence to explain ONE example of how a political point of view is shown through the depiction of the events.

title: Task 4: Explain how an art historical interpretation of a work of art is derived from an analysis of its form, style, materials, content, function, context, reception, or meaning.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately explain how the Bayeux Tapestry reflects the point of view of its patron.
Response accurately explains how the Bayeux Tapestry reflects the point of view of its patron.
